text: The Independence Hall of Israel is a building in Tel Aviv in Israel. It is where the ceremony of independence of the State of Israel was held on Friday, May 14, 1948. The building has been restored to look like it did on the day of the announcement. == Gallery == File:Israel ind mus.JPG|the building File:Indememe 018.jpg|the restored room == Other websites == * Official website Category:Museums in Tel Aviv
title: Independence Hall (Israel)
